on reading compounds: 積ん読【ツンドク】buying books and not reading them, stockpiling books, books bought but not read
必読【ヒツドク】must-read, required reading
読本【トクホン】reading-book, reader, guidebook, manual, textbook (esp. a pre-war elementary school Japanese language textbook)
句読【クトウ】breaks and pauses (in a sentence), punctuation, way of reading (esp. kanbun)
kun reading compounds: 読む【よむ】to read, to count, to guess, to predict, to read (someone's thoughts), to see (e.g. into someone's heart), to divine
